oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Otho Strahl
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite of Confederate general Otho F. Strahl
Strahl was one of five Confederate generals killed at the Battle of Franklin, November 30, 1864.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Governor John C. Brown Photograph Album
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carte de visite; Franklin, Battle of, Franklin, Tenn., 1864; Generals--Confederate States of America
Photographs; Generals; Civil wars
